WidgetInfo.Description: This widget will perform a buffering operation on selected features in the Map. Either a popup window or the task pane will be used to gather user input, depending on the setting of the Target parameter.
WidgetInfo.Label: Create a buffer

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Label: The name of a task pane widget or a popup window
Parameter.Description: If this is a TaskPane widget, this widget will set a URL in the TaskPane to gather user input, otherwise it looks for an HTML element with this name, otherwise it will open a popup window to gather user input.
